data.eml:eml: A new microendemic species of Tropidurus (Squamata: Tropiduridae) from southern Brazil and revalidation of Tropidurus catalanensis Gudynas & Skuk, 1983

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kunz, Tobias Saraiva, Borges-Martins, Márcio (2013): A new microendemic species of Tropidurus (Squamata: Tropiduridae) from southern Brazil and revalidation of Tropidurus catalanensis Gudynas & Skuk, 1983. Zootaxa 3681 (4): 413-439, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3681.4.6
